He is the type of aristocratic Alpha young Omega dabeutantes are warned to avoid at all costs. Stiles Stilinski is the 16 year old Omega son of Baron Noah Stilinski and his wife, Claudia. Taken to London for his debut into The Season and make a 'perfect match', Stiles is strenuously warned against any association with Viscount Hale by his cousin and Mother. entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,815Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 64

Summary: ‚ÄúWell,‚Äù Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, ‚Äúat least this time he didn‚Äôt almost get us all killed.‚ÄùDerek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. ‚ÄúI was drunk.‚Äù They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It‚Äôs steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. ‚ÄúYou were careless,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúYou are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.‚Äù --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. entry.title: if i love you less, will you love me more?
entry.summary:
Author: sumsie

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,148Chapters: 11/11Kudos: 40

Summary: After the worst year Beacon Hills has seen, Stiles Stilinski survives by staying useful. He helps on hunts and works nights at the sheriff‚Äôs station. Derek Hale lives on the edge of town and further from everyone else. He fights because it is easier than grieving. When Stiles becomes a constant presence, Derek allows it, not out of kindness but because Stiles understands violence and silence too well. Derek offers protection without comfort. Stiles offers devotion without limits. What grows between them is intense and unbalanced. Their bond is forged in blood and aftermath. As threats close in, Stiles begins to lose himself in Derek‚Äôs shadow, learning that survival is not the same as being cared for.

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 2
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,369Chapters: 2/18Kudos: 39

Summary: Kate Argent is dead. Victoria Argent is locked up for life. But Gerard's out on the prowl, bloodthirsty for revenge and there is a Kanima running around town killing people, seemingly at random. With the help of the magic councils, can Chris and Allison trick Gerard into defeat? More importantly, will Chris be able to move past what he's done?While the pack races to figure out who the Kanima is and Stiles attempts to control his ever-growing magic, Gerard Argent looms closer and closer, threatening to unravel the pack and the happiness they have found. Coffee Shop AU Rewrite of Season 2. Please read Book 1 first, to understand what is going on.

entry.title: A Second Chance
entry.summary:
Author: AShortWalkToDelinquency

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,060Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 149

Summary: Stiles is rubbing at the back of his neck again, the flush across his cheeks growing impossibly deeper as he looks anywhere but at Derek. "They, um. My AP magic students. They, uh, they kind of ship us?" Derek is starting to feel like a broken record, but the only thing he can think to ask is, "What?"
